Translations.Text: “Nena: “Choonadi chadza (chisilamu); ndipo chabodza (chipembedzo cha mafano) sichidzetsa zachilendo, ndiponso sichibwerera (kukhala ndi nyonga monga kale).”

“Nena: “Ngati ndasokera, ndiye kuti ndadzisokeretsa ndekha (ndadziyika ndekha m’mavuto). Koma ngati ndaongoka, ndichifukwa cha zimene akundivumbulutsira Mbuye wanga. Ndithu Iye Ngwakumva; ali pafupi (ndi aliyense).”
“Ndipo ukadaona pamene adzanjenjemera (akadzachiona chilango cha Allah, adzayesera kuthawa), koma sipadzapezeka pothawira, ndipo adzagwidwa pamtunda wapafupi (asanafike kutali)
“Ndipo adzanena (mophuphaphupha): “Tachikhulupirira (tsopano chipembedzo cha Chisilamu).” Koma iwo angaulandire chotani (Usilamu) kumeneko (komwe) ndikumalo akutali
“Pomwe chikhalirenicho adachikana kale (Chisilamu). Ndipo chobisika ankachigenda (ndi bodza) kuchokera kumalo akutali
“Ndipo padzatsekeka pakati pawo ndi zimene akuzilakalaka, monga momwe adachitidwira anzawo akale. Ndithu iwo adali m’chikaiko chowakaikitsa (uthenga wa Allah)

“Kuyamikidwa konse nkwa Allah (Yekha) Muumbi wa thambo ndi nthaka (popanda chofanizira), amene adachita angelo kukhala atumwi eni mapiko, awiriawiri; atatuatatu; ndi anayianayi. Amaonjezera mkulenga monga momwe afunira, (palibe chimene chingakanike kwa Iye). Ndithu Allah Ngokhoza chilichonse
“Chifundo chimene Allah angatsekule kwa anthu, palibe amene angachitsekereze. Ndipo chimene angachiletse palibe amene angachipereke kupatula Iye. Ndipo Iye ndi Mwini mphamvu zoposa, Wanzeru zakuya

“E inu anthu! Kumbukirani chisomo cha Allah chomwe chili pa inu (pomthokoza). Kodi alipo Mlengi wina osati Allah amene angakupatseni rizq kuchokera kumwamba ndi pansi? Palibe wina wopembedzedwa mwachoonadi, koma Iye. Nanga mukutembenuzidwira kuti
